link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Share Capital = (Ordinary Shares + Compulsory Convertible Preference Shares + Preference shares other than Compulsory Convertible)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Reserves and Surplus = (Capital Reserve + Debenture Redemption Reserve + Capital Redemption Reserve + Share Premium + General Reserves + Share Application Money Pending Allottment + Revaluation Reserves Other Reserves + Balance of profit and loss account)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Secured Borrowings = (Debentures + Deferred credits + Borrowings from Banks + Borrowings from FIs + Borrowings from Government (Central & State) + Borrowings from Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs) + Other Borrowings + Interest accrued but not due on the above)" do not tally.

Identity "Total Unsecured Borrowings = (Borrowings from relatives of promoters / directors + Inter-corporate borrowings + Borrowings from Banks + Borrowings from FIs + Borrowings from Government (Central and State) + Borrowings from Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs) + Commercial paper + Debentures not in the nature of public deposit + Commercial paper + Money received by way of caution money, margin money from the borrowers, lessee, hires or by way of security or advance from agents in the course of company's business or advance received against orders for supply of goods or properties or for rendering services + Borrowings from Holding Companies + Other Borrowings + Interest accrued but not due on the above)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Loans & Advances = (Secured + Unsecured)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Borrowings = (Borrowings payable more than 12 months + Borrowings payable more than 3 months but less than or equal to 12 months + Borrowings payable less than or equal to 3 months)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Current Liabilities = (Current Liabilities + Sundry Creditors + Liabilities to Subsidiaries & Holding Companies + Deferred Tax Liabilities (Net) and Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Provisions = (Provision for Standard Assets + Provision Held for Non Performing Assets + Provision for Diminution on Investments + For taxation + For contingencies + For pension, gratuity and similar staff benefit schemes + Proposed dividends + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Capital and Liabilities = (Share Capital + Total Reserves & Surplus + Total Secured Borrowings + Total Un-Secured Borrowings + Total Current Liabilities + Total Provisions + Other Liabilities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Loans & Advances = (Loans to Corporates + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Investments = (Total Long Term Investments + Total Current Investments)" do not tally.
Total of Loans & Advances disclosed as per status of security should match with Total of Loans & Advances disclosed as per type of loans and advances

"Identity ""Value of Total Long Term Investments = (Security Receipts + Others)"" do not tally.
Identity ""Value of Total Current Investments = (Security Receipts + Others)"" do not tally"
Identity "Value of Cash and Bank Balances = (Cash in Hand + Deposits with Banks)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Other Current Assets = (Advance Taxes paid / Tax deducted at source + Interest Accrued On Investments, + Deferred Tax Assets(Net) + Interest Accrued on Loans & Advances + Prepaid expenses and Other Intangible assets + Security Deposits + Sundry/Trade Debtors + Advances to Staff + Stock in Trade, + Share Application Money + ST loans and advances to: (a) Trusts and other recoverable from trusts + Loans and Advances to Resolution agents + Deferred Revenue Expenditure + Others - to be netted off to arrive at Owned Funds (to be specified in remarks column) + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Assets = (Total Loans & Advances + Hire Purchase and Lease Assets + Investments (As per AS-13) + Cash and Bank Balances + Other Current Assets + Premises & Fixed Assets (i) Fixed assets + Premises & Fixed Assets (ii) Assets Acquired in Satisfaction of Claims + Miscellaneous expenditure (to the extent not written off or adjusted), + Profit and Loss Account (Accumulated Loss) + Other Assets)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Capital and Liabilities = Value of Total Assets" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Net Lease Income = (Gross Lease Income + Add/Less:Lease Equalisation Credit/Charge)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Interest Income = (Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits + Interest on Other Loans)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Investment Income = (Interest + Dividends)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Fund-Based Income = (Net Lease Income + Interest Income + Investment Income + Profit on Sale of Investments + Other fund-based income)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Fee-Based Income = (Management Fees + Other fee based income)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Miscellaneous income = (Bad debts written back + Gain / profit from resolution of financial assets + upside income on full redemption of SRs + Other Miscellaneous income like incentives, etc)"do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Income from Financial Business = (Fund-Based Income + Fee-Based Income + Miscellaneous income)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Income = (Income from Financial Business + Income from Non-Financial Business)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Interest Expense and other financing cost = (Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits + Interest on credits from Banks + Interest on credits from Financial Institutions + Other Financing Charges)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Operating Expenses = (Employee Costs + Other Administrative Costs)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Expenses = (Depreciation on Fixed Assets including Leased Assets + Interest Expense and other financing cost + Expenses incurred for pre-acquisition stage due diligence + Expenses incurred on financial assets post acquisition + Brokerage (including reimbursement of expenses to brokers) + Loss on Sale of Investments + Bad Debts written off + Provisions against Non-Performing Assets + Reversal of Income on NPAs + Diminution in value of investments + Reversal of Management fees as per RBI guidelines + Reversal of receivables from trusts as per RBI guidelines + Expenses Relating to Non-Financial Business )" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Profit before Tax = (Total Income -Total expenses)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Net Profit/Loss = (Profit before Tax - Provision for taxation)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total of Equity shares through Foreign Sources = (Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPI) + Foreign Direct Investment)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total of foreign sources funds = (Equity shares through foreign sources + Borrowings through foreign sources + Bonds/Debentures through foreign sources + Others through foreign sources)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total adjustments to calculate Owned Funds = (Accumulated balance of loss + Deferred Revenue Expenditure + Deferred Tax Asset (Net) + Other Intangible Assets + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Owned Fund (after deduction) = (Owned Funds - Total adjustments to calculate Owned Funds)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Risk Weighted Assets = (Cash and deposits with scheduled commercial banks/NABARD/SIDBI + Investments in Government securities + Shares in other SCs/RCs + All Other assets + All contingent liabilities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Adjusted Value = (Book Value * Risk weight)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Owned Fund = (Ordinary Shares + Compulsory Convertible Preference Shares + Capital Reserve + Debenture Redemption Reserve + Capital Redemption Reserve + Share Premium + General Reserves + Other reserves + Balance of profit and loss account)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total adjustments to calculate Net Owned Funds= (Investment in shares of Subsidiaries + Investment in shares of Companies in the same Group + Investment in shares of ARC's + The Book value of debentures, bonds, outstanding loans and advances, bills purchased and discounted (including hire-purchase and lease finance) made to, and deposits with subsidiaries + The Book value of debentures, bonds, outstanding loans and advances, bills purchased and discounted (including hire-purchase and lease finance) made to, and deposits with Companies in the same Group)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds = (Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds, If Owned funds < 0; Else Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds = (Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds - (0.10 X Owned funds))" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Net owned funds = ((Owned funds - Total adjustment to calculate net owned funds), If Owned funds < 0; Else Net owned funds = (Owned funds - Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds))" do not tally.
All values reported for reserves and surplus should be positive.
Total foreign sources of funds < or = Total Capital and Liabilities.
Identity "Value of Authorised Capital = (Equity Share Capital + Preference Share Capital.)" do not tally.

Identity "Debentures = (Subscribed by Retail Investors + Subscribed by Mutual Funds + Subscribed by Banks + Subscribed by NBFCs + Subscribed by Insurance Companies + Subscribed by Pension Funds + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Borrowings from Banks for Secured Borrowings = (Term Loans + Working Capital loans + Cash Credit + Overdraft)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Borrowings from Banks for Unsecured Borrowings = (Term Loans + Working Capital loans + Cash Credit + Overdraft)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Commercial paper = (Subscribed by Retail Investors + Subscribed by Mutual Funds + Subscribed by Banks + Subscribed by NBFCs + Subscribed by Insurance Companies + Subscribed by Pension Funds + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Inter-corporate borrowings = (Of which From Group Entities + From Non-Group Entities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Loans & Advances = (Amount receivable within 3 months + Amount receivable within 3 to 12 months, + Amount receivable more than 12 months)" do not tally.
